#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

[http://openvibe.inria.fr/ OpenVibe] is a open source BCI application developed by [http://www.inria.fr Inria] French National Institute for Research in Computer Science and Control. 


= Details =

It is written in C/C++. Is supports Emotiv if you have Emotiv Research SDK. It comes with a very nice designer where you can model the flow of your application.
